### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.etsy.com/uk/listing/647327604/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.etsy.com%2Fuk%2Flisting%2F647327604%2F) ### Comment > Site won't load, leaves a blank white screen with '429 Too Many Requests'. I had this with numerous Etsy links I had saved with AdGuard turned on on Mac O/S 12.6.4 (21G526) > I don't have a GitHub account. ### Screenshots

AdGuard Japanese,
EasyList Italy,
Liste AR Userscripts: | I don't know. Your questions assume a lot of tech knowledge. Link below was in here aleeady so I just left it. Web+of+Trust+(url:+https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-wot/1.0/wot.user.js),
AdGuard+Popup+Blocker+(url:+https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/popup-blocker/2.5/popupblocker.user.js),
AdGuard+Assistant+(url:+https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/assistant/4.3/assistant.user.js),
AdGuard+Extra+(url:+https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js) Other extensions used: | Don't track me Google, Google Container, Protect My Choices, Privacy Possum, Duck Duck Go, Facebook Container, Firefox Multi Account Containers, Malwarebytes Browser Guard, Bit Defender Traffic Light. I turned them all OFF and tested again from new link, but still had the same issue. It's only on Mac though, same link works fine on iOS.

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.etsy.com/search?q=photo+frame&ref=search_bar](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.etsy.com%2Fsearch%3Fq%3Dphoto%2Bframe%26ref%3Dsearch_bar) ### Comment Username: @kittymmeow > With the AdGuard Base filter list enabled on the search page on Etsy, everything is blocked EXCEPT the ads. С гугл новостей перенаправляет на юрл `https://www.dynamomania.com/ru/news/678965-iskusstvennyj-intellekt-popytalsya-vybrat-sleduyuschego-trenera-dlya-dinamo-chto-iz-etogo-vyshlo`, и только после перехода с гугл ньюс на целевой юрл , при переходе по внутренним ссылкам можно словить кликандер,не иначе!😶

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This rule seems to works fine on my end:
```adblock
etsy.com#?#div[data-search-results] .wt-list-unstyled .wt-text-caption > span[class]:contains(/Ad[\s\S].*by Etsy seller/):matches-css(display: inline-block):upward(.wt-list-unstyled)
```
but I'm not sure if it should be added - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/148111#issuecomment-1513134079
@Alex-302 Could you please take a look?

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.49.1b7

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.usatoday.com/videos/news/have-you-seen/2021/05/05/huge-hairy-spider-forces-australian-woman-face-fears/4953588001/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
The filter list causes the entire article to be hidden. Caused by `usatoday.com##div[class]:has(> aside[aria-label="advertisement"])` in AdGuard Mobile Ads

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![Screenshot from 2023-04-25 18-48-56](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/89158249/234424184-6d8ab66f-6495-4d32-9b1d-a63280e1f98a.png)


</details>

Send Do-Not-Track signals
